folder.name: setup for  dedicated sql pool for test  bank data

content.query:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- C.  CREATE STAGING TABLES (all VARCHAR to avoid parse issues)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE BankCredit.stg_customers (
    customer_id VARCHAR(500),
    age VARCHAR(200),
    gender VARCHAR(50),
    income VARCHAR(200),
    employment_status VARCHAR(200),
    years_employed VARCHAR(200),
    city VARCHAR(200),
    state VARCHAR(200)
) WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP);
GO

CREATE TABLE BankCredit.stg_loans (
    loan_id VARCHAR(500),
    customer_id VARCHAR(500),
    loan_amount VARCHAR(200),
    loan_purpose VARCHAR(200),
    loan_term_months VARCHAR(200),
    interest_rate VARCHAR(200),
    issue_date VARCHAR(200),
    loan_status VARCHAR(200)
) WITH (DISTRIBUTION = HASH(customer_id), HEAP);
GO

CREATE TABLE BankCredit.stg_credit_history (
    customer_id VARCHAR(500),
    credit_score VARCHAR(200),
    num_credit_accounts VARCHAR(200),
    total_credit_limit VARCHAR(200),
    credit_utilization VARCHAR(200),
    num_late_payments VARCHAR(200),
    bankruptcies VARCHAR(200)
) WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP);
GO

PRINT 'Staging tables created';
GO
